title: Pandemic Learning Gap Resolution Strategies: Self-Directed Learning Design Using Digital Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Customized strategies are required that reflect the characteristics of adult learners (work experience, multi-year learning history).

learning_goals: Diagnose personal learning gaps occurring during pandemics using at least three digital tools
Establish weekly self-directed learning plans to address learning deficits in mathematics and science
Propose at least two collaborative strategies with family members to build home-based learning support systems
Learners can achieve an attendance rate and real-time interaction participation rate of over 80% in an online lecture environment.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Notion)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
